original_text: At that time we took all his towns and we gave everything as a gift to the Lord. We killed the men, women and children. We left no one alive.
korean_text: 그 때에 우리가 그의 모든 성읍을 점령하고 그의 각 성읍을 그 남녀와 유아와 함께 하나도 남기지 아니하고 진멸하였고

sentences.original_text: At that time we took all his towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때 우리는 그의 모든 성읍을 점령했고

sentences.original_text: and we gave everything as a gift to the Lord
We killed the men, women and children
